verses.verse: וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach an altar עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim; [of] shittim חָמֵשׁ֩ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh five אַמּ֨וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits אֹ֜רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech long וְחָמֵ֧שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and five אַמּ֣וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits רֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav, broad רָב֤וּעַ <S%H7251><s%> ra-Vu-a' shall be foursquare יִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach, the altar וְשָׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> ve-sha-Losh thereof [shall be] three אַמּ֖וֹת <S%H520><s%> am-Mot cubits קֹמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6967><s%> ko-ma-To. and the height

וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make קַרְנֹתָ֗יו <S%H7161><s%> kar-no-Tav, the horns עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al on אַרְבַּ֣ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' of it upon the four פִּנֹּתָ֔יו <S%H6438><s%> pin-no-Tav, corners מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu at תִּהְיֶ֣יןָ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-na become קַרְנֹתָ֑יו <S%H7161><s%> kar-no-Tav; thereof his horns וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> ve-tzip-pi-Ta shall be of the same and thou shalt overlay אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. it with brass

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make סִּֽירֹתָיו֙ <S%H5518><s%> si-ro-Tav his pans לְדַשְּׁנ֔וֹ <S%H1878><s%> le-dash-she-No, to receive his ashes וְיָעָיו֙ <S%H3257><s%> ve-ya-'Av and his shovels וּמִזְרְקֹתָ֔יו <S%H4219><s%> u-miz-re-ko-Tav, and his basons וּמִזְלְגֹתָ֖יו <S%H4207><s%> u-miz-le-go-Tav and his fleshhooks וּמַחְתֹּתָ֑יו <S%H4289><s%> u-mach-to-Tav; and his firepans לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all כֵּלָ֖יו <S%H3627><s%> ke-Lav all the vessels תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh thereof thou shalt make נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. [of] brass

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make לּוֹ֙ lo מִכְבָּ֔ר <S%H4345><s%> mich-Bar, for it a grate מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> ma-'a-Seh of network רֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> Re-shet and upon the net נְחֹ֑שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet; [of] brass וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta shalt thou make עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and on הָרֶ֗שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> ha-Re-shet, the net אַרְבַּע֙ <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' four טַבְּעֹ֣ת <S%H2885><s%> tab-be-'Ot rings נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet, brasen עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' in the four קְצוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H7098><s%> ke-tzo-Tav. corners

וְנָתַתָּ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Tah And thou shalt put אֹתָ֗הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah, תַּ֛חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat beneath כַּרְכֹּ֥ב <S%H3749><s%> kar-Ko it under the compass הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach of the altar מִלְּמָ֑טָּה <S%H4295><s%> mil-le-Mat-tah; beneath וְהָיְתָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah will reach הָרֶ֔שֶׁת <S%H7568><s%> ha-Re-shet, that the net עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad may be even to חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi the midst הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach. of the altar

וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make בַדִּים֙ <S%H905><s%> vad-Dim staves לַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> lam-miz-Be-ach, for the altar בַּדֵּ֖י <S%H905><s%> bad-Dei staves עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> 'a-Tzei wood שִׁטִּ֑ים <S%H7848><s%> shit-Tim; [of] shittim וְצִפִּיתָ֥ <S%H6823><s%> ve-tzip-pi-Ta and overlay אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam נְחֹֽשֶׁת׃ <S%H5178><s%> ne-Cho-shet. them with brass

וְהוּבָ֥א <S%H935><s%> ve-hu-Va shall be put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בַּדָּ֖יו <S%H905><s%> bad-Dav And the staves בַּטַּבָּעֹ֑ת <S%H2885><s%> bat-tab-ba-'Ot; into the rings וְהָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yu become הַבַּדִּ֗ים <S%H905><s%> hab-bad-Dim, and the staves עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- upon שְׁתֵּ֛י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei shall be upon the two צַלְעֹ֥ת <S%H6763><s%> tzal-'Ot sides הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach of the altar בִּשְׂאֵ֥ת <S%H5375><s%> bis-'Et to bear אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

נְב֥וּב <S%H5014><s%> ne-Vuv Hollow לֻחֹ֖ת <S%H3871><s%> lu-Chot with boards תַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Seh shalt thou make אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher it הֶרְאָ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> her-'Ah it as it was shewed אֹתְךָ֛ <S%H853><s%> 'o-te-Cha בָּהָ֖ר <S%H2022><s%> ba-Har thee in the mount כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> ken so יַעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Su. so shall they make ס sa-Mek

וְעָשִׂ֕יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt make אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et חֲצַ֣ר <S%H2691><s%> cha-Tzar the court הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> ham-mish-Kan; of the tabernacle לִפְאַ֣ת <S%H6285><s%> lif-'At side נֶֽגֶב־ <S%H5045><s%> ne-gev- for the south תֵּ֠ימָנָה <S%H8486><s%> Tei-ma-nah southward קְלָעִ֨ים <S%H7050><s%> ke-la-'Im [there shall be] hangings לֶחָצֵ֜ר <S%H2691><s%> le-cha-Tzer for the court שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8336><s%> shesh linen מָשְׁזָ֗ר <S%H7806><s%> ma-she-Zar, [of] fine twined מֵאָ֤ה <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ah of an hundred בָֽאַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> va-'am-Mah cubits אֹ֔רֶךְ <S%H753><s%> 'O-rech, long לַפֵּאָ֖ה <S%H6285><s%> lap-pe-'Ah side הָאֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chat. for one
